levelledPara.title: Scope
levelledPara.para: This data module defines standard practices for sealants and adhesives application on AMPEL360 PLUS airframe components.

levelledPara.title: Approved Materials
levelledPara.para: Only certified aerospace-grade sealants and adhesives shall be used, with temperature ratings appropriate for space tourism operations.

levelledPara.title: Application Procedures
levelledPara.para: Surface preparation, environmental conditions, and cure times must be strictly followed per manufacturer specifications and this standard.

levelledPara.title: Cross-References
levelledPara.para: For pressure vessel sealing, see ATA-21. For fuel system sealing, see ATA-28. For environmental control sealing, see ATA-21.
